## Room.changeCustomPlayerStatus() method

修改自己的玩家自定义状态,如果当前在房间中会同时会触发通知(房间中所有玩家)

**Signature:**

```typescript
changeCustomPlayerStatus(customPlayerStatus: number, robotPlayerId?: string): Promise<IResult<null>>;
```
